Package com.opentok.android

Interface Summary
Publisher.Listener Monitors state changes in a Publisher object.
Session.Listener Monitors state changes of a Session instance.
Subscriber.Listener Monitors state changes of a Subscriber instance.
 

Class Summary
Connection The Connection object represents a connection to a TokBox session.
Publisher A publisher captures an audio-video stream from the device's microphone and camera.
Session The first step in using the OpenTok Android SDK is to initialize a Session instance by calling the Session.newInstance() method.
Stream Used to describe a stream bound to an OpenTok session.
Subscriber Consumes audio and video of a publisher in the OpenTok session.
 

Enum Summary
OpentokException.Domain Defines error domains values for OpentokException objects.
OpentokException.ErrorCode Defines error code values for OpentokException objects.
 

Exception Summary
OpentokException Exceptions thrown by the OpenTok Android SDK.
